commission_note: The commission amount is deducted at the time of payment by the buyer
protection_description: SHOPIN offers you practical tools, such as private messaging and a reporting system, to ensure a secure environment and trustworthy transactions.
experience_description: Whether you're buying or selling, your experience on SHOPIN will always be marked by exceptional service, unmatched simplicity, and guaranteed satisfaction.
livraison_description: A delivery person will come directly to your door to pick up or deliver your items. No more hassle with remote sales!
profile_photo_validation: We inform you that your profile photo will undergo a validation process, which may take up to a maximum of 24 hours before it is approved.
thank_you_message: We thank you for your patience and understanding.
login_to_sell_and_buy: Log in to sell and buy on SHOPIN
receive_notifications: You may receive SMS or email notifications for updates. You can unsubscribe at any time.
password_min_length: Password must be at least 8 characters.
terms_condition: Please read carefully and accept our terms and conditions before continuing.
accept_conditions: I accept the Terms and Conditions.
title: Here is the SHOPINER
Vous avez déjà signalé cette annonce !: You have already reported this item!

ad_illegal_products: Ad with prohibited or illegal products
multiple_ads_same_item: Multiple ad of the same item
misleading_description: Misleading description of the item condition
incorrect_info: Incorrect information about size, color, etc.
excessive_price: Excessive price for the listed product
copyright_violation: Violation of copyright or intellectual property rights
message_placeholder: Please enter a message clearly explaining the reason for your report. Your message must be at least 20 characters long.
recent_purchase: Your most recent purchase with :username was on :date
leave_review_info: You can leave a review in the form of stars only if you have made a purchase from this seller!
no_more_review: You can no longer leave a review because you have already done so!
subject: Subject
step_1_title: Post your item online in a flash
step_1_description: Add attractive photos, describe your item carefully, and set a competitive price.
step_2_description: Carefully pack your item. A delivery driver will come to collect it from you, with no effort on your part.
step_3_description: 24 hours after successful delivery, your payment will be made via the agreed-upon terms.
step_4_description: Join SHOPIN today, sell your items, and discover unique treasures to buy.
explore_your_way_description: Use our multi-criteria search to refine your desires or let yourself be surprised by browsing the items of other SHOPINERS until you find the perfect match.
add_to_favorites_title: Add to your favorites with one click
add_to_favorites_description: Found something you like? Tap the little heart to instantly add it to your favorites list and never lose sight of your gems.
validate_cart_title: Validate your cart in no time
validate_cart_description: Ready to give in? Click on “Validate my cart”. It couldn’t be easier: payment is made upon delivery for guaranteed peace of mind.
receive_package_description: Once your order is confirmed, a delivery person will bring it directly to your door. SHOPIN makes your shopping as convenient as it is enjoyable!
registration_description: When registering on the SHOPIN website, the user must fill out a form containing their first name, last name, username, email, phone number, and date of birth. The user can modify or delete their account at any time.
seller_commission_intro: The seller authorizes SHOPIN to retain a commission on the total price of the item as follows:
luxury_brand_commission: Luxury Brand (SHOPIN Luxury): 10% of the item price
other_category_commission: Any other category: 7% of the item price
delivery_fees_not_included: Delivery fees are not included in the commission calculation base. Once the item is received by the buyer, SHOPIN will pay the seller the price of the item minus the commission within 3 days. To receive their payment, the seller must provide proof of identity and bank details with a photo for necessary verification (CIN and RIB).
confidentiality_content: SHOPIN collects, stores, and uses certain personal data of users (first name, last name, phone number, city, and email), along with users' location data. SHOPIN ensures that users' personal information is protected against any illegal activities.
cookies_content: The site uses cookies to distinguish users/visitors from other site users in order to help SHOPIN improve their experience while navigating the site.
articles_for_sale_content: The seller commits to ensuring that any item listed for sale is free from defects (stains, holes, or tears...). The buyer, upon receiving such an item, has the right to return it. It is forbidden to resell counterfeit or illegal items. The seller agrees to provide real photos of the item being sold. The description of this item must correspond to its actual characteristics. SHOPIN has full rights to request the seller to change or remove their item, or inform them that SHOPIN will do it directly in case of an error (e.g., incorrect category).
return_content: In case of delivery failure, the seller must be available to receive the returned item.
luxury_description: An item belonging to the SHOPIN LUXURY category must:
luxury_authentication_condition: be authenticated before delivery to the buyer
luxury_category_condition: An item belonging to the SHOPIN LUXURY category will be:
luxury_sale_steps: Steps for selling an item in the SHOPIN LUXURY category:
luxury_publish_item: Publish the luxury item for sale
luxury_purchase_confirmation: After purchase confirmation, our team will inform you of the sale, and an appointment will be scheduled for pick-up
luxury_item_authentication: The item will be authenticated by our team
luxury_item_delivery: If the item is authentic, it will be delivered within 3 days
luxury_payment_confirmation: After the item is received by the buyer, your payment will be credited to your account within 24 hours
luxury_return_policy: Return policy for SHOPIN LUXURY items:
luxury_authentication_policy: SHOPIN maintains a strict policy against counterfeits. If counterfeit products, defective items, illicit duplicates (copied, reproduced, or manufactured illegally), or items violating intellectual property rights are received, our team will contact the seller by email or phone to inform them of the return of the item, providing conclusive evidence of the counterfeit, and the order will be canceled. The item will be permanently removed from the SHOPIN catalog. Return and authentication fees of 120 dirhams will be charged to the seller. The seller's information will be recorded, prohibiting them from selling counterfeit products in the future. To avoid inconvenience, the seller must provide authentic and unchanged documents such as the certificate of authenticity, invoice, or price tag. Buyers are encouraged to carefully read the full description of the item and inquire in the comments section if the item is authentic or a replica.
remaining_time_to_update: Remaining time for a new update
no_items_found: No items found for these search criteria.
modification_blocked_message: because it was changed less than a week ago.

notifications.new_order_message:
:salutation :seller, your item :post_title has been ordered by :buyer. Please prepare the item for shipping. A courier from our logistics partner will contact you soon and pick up the item.
Thank you for clicking here to confirm or update your bank details (RIB), so we can transfer the funds when the sale process is complete.
welcome.shopin: Welcome to the world of SHOPIN, the platform that transforms your buying and selling habits. Here, every item tells a story, and each transaction becomes an opportunity to be part of a responsible and trendy movement.
why.shopin: Why choose SHOPIN? Because we are not just an online marketplace — we are a community that values your needs, your desires, and your impact. Explore a wide selection of new and second-hand items, discover hidden gems, and easily sell your own goods.
join.shopin: By joining SHOPIN, you embrace a smarter and more sustainable way of consuming. You help reduce waste while discovering unique treasures that reflect your style and values.
call.to.action: Don’t let your unused items collect dust — turn them into income. And for bargain hunters, your next favorite find is already waiting for you on SHOPIN. Join us today and become a SHOPINER — a part of a positive, practical, and rewarding change!
address_info_note: Note: You are editing the primary address of your account. Changes made to this address will update your address information in "My Account".
complete_address_info: Please complete all the default address information to continue the order. Click here
complete_main_address_info: Please complete all the information of your main address to continue the order.
cash_on_delivery_info: You pay upon delivery (at your chosen address) and receive your order safely.
terms_notice: By proceeding with your order, you accept the Terms and Conditions of SHOPIN.
confirmation_message: You will receive a confirmation email including a summary of your order.
